prompt: Design a music player UI with a minimalist monochrome theme and a dark background. Place a circular album cover with a thin white border at the top center. Display the song title in a bold, white sans-serif font and the artist name in a smaller, light gray font below it. Include a progress bar with a white fill and time indicators in a clean, monospaced font. Center a row of playback controls (skip-previous, play/pause, skip-next) using simple, outlined white buttons. Add a volume slider with a white speaker icon at the bottom. Use a solid black background and a single-column layout with tight spacing for a sleek, understated look.
